### Background

```{r bg, echo=F, results = "asis", eval = T}

i <- 1
while(i <= nrow(onc_enrich_report[['config']][['project_background']][['items']])){
  cat(paste0('* ',onc_enrich_report[['config']][['project_background']][['items']][i,],'\n'))
```
